title: Stuck at the Login Screen.
body: The League of Legends server is having issues letting people in? Im guessing its happening everywhere? I couldn't join my lobby then restarted client and was suddenly briefed Authenticating.. Hopefully this gets fixed as soon as possible.

replies.body: We were having some login issues a bit earlier today, but those seem to have cleared up at this point. Have you been able to get logged in yet?
